title: Random lag spikes in recent games
body: Everything was working smoothly until a few days ago.... I just get random lag spikes that last a second every few seconds... the game is unplayable at this point :/ Ive never had issues like this and I know its not my internet because more internet intesive games (Cs:go, Tera, etc...) have no issues in terms of connectivity.

replies.body: Same bro, its horrible... Do you happen to live in CA?

> [{quoted}](name=Adeptus Terra,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=5lFcHynw,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-07-08T02:35:13.433+0000)

> Same bro, its horrible... Do you happen to live in CA?

Yeah actually I do... not too far from toronto

what did u change on ur firewall? mine has been only doing this randomly for past 4 days never before this has this happened, my firewall has been on this whole time as im aware and i havnt had lag like this ever before , i just turned it off now ill see if it changes anything but i doubt it will

> [{quoted}](name=soljerr,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=5lFcHynw,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-07-10T01:51:42.328+0000)
>
> what did u change on ur firewall? mine has been only doing this randomly for past 4 days never before this has this happened

I just went into windows firewall and allowed league to have all access. and I also started using Razor Cortex those two fixes together allow me to go from connection issues with minimal settings to running at max video settings without so much as a hiccup!

Random lag spikes can happen from an unstable connection, but there could be other reasons.  We have a sweet[ Log Reader ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader)tool that can look at these exact moments in your match and pinpoint what went wrong.  Uploading the match log will provide the best options to get you back in the game without problems!
